decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted (604-100-AL.dwg; 604-101-AL.dwg; 604-102-AL.dwg; 604-103-AL.dwg; 604-104-AL.dwg; 604-110-AL.dwg; 604-111-AL.dwg; 604-112-AL.dwg; 604-120-AL.dwg; 604-121-AL.dwg; 604-140-AL.dwg; 604-141-AL.dwg; 604-142-AL.dwg; 604-143-AL.dwg; 604-144-AL.dwg; 604-150-AL.dwg; 604-151-AL.dwg; 604-152-AL.dwg; 604-160-AL.dwg; 604-161-AL.dwg ; received 25.08.2015) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.
description: Enlargement of a basement extension including rear lightwell and relocation of first floor rear window to the house
